name: Delibird
description: The Delivery Pokémon. It shares its food with people who are stranded. Because Delibird is omnivorous, sometimes it gives those people bug Pokémon.

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be put to sleep.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.description: When you score a critical hit, you may immediately gain an additional action on your turn. If this action is used to make an attack, you have disadvantage on the roll. You may only ever have one additional action per round.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to sleep.
